exterior.title: Driveway Resurfacing
exterior.description: Resurface the driveway to improve curb appeal and functionality. This involves cleaning, repairing cracks, and applying a new layer of asphalt or concrete.

exterior.title: Front Yard Landscaping
exterior.description: Enhance the front yard with new plants, mulch, and a small garden. This will improve the aesthetic appeal and increase property value.

exterior.title: Deck Renovation
exterior.description: Renovate the existing deck by replacing worn-out boards, adding a new coat of paint or stain, and possibly expanding the deck area. This will create a more inviting outdoor space.

exterior.title: Shed Refurbishment
exterior.description: Refurbish the backyard shed by repainting, repairing any structural issues, and adding shelving or storage solutions. This will enhance utility and appearance.

exterior.title: Fence Repair and Staining
exterior.description: Repair any damaged sections of the fence and apply a fresh coat of stain to protect against weathering. This will improve the overall look and longevity of the fence.

living area.title: Floor Refinishing
living area.description: Refinish the hardwood floors to restore their shine and remove any scratches or wear. This will enhance the overall look of the living area and increase the property's appeal.

living area.title: Paint Refresh
living area.description: Apply a fresh coat of paint to the walls in a modern, neutral color to brighten the space and make it more appealing to potential buyers.

living area.title: Lighting Upgrade
living area.description: Replace outdated lighting fixtures with modern, energy-efficient options to improve the ambiance and functionality of the living area.

living area.title: Window Treatment Update
living area.description: Install new window treatments such as blinds or curtains to enhance privacy and style, complementing the overall decor of the living area.

living area.title: Decorative Molding Installation
living area.description: Add decorative crown molding to the ceiling to give the living area a more finished and elegant look.

kitchen.title: Cabinet Refacing
kitchen.description: Refacing the existing cabinets with new doors and hardware to give the kitchen a modern look without the cost of full replacement.

kitchen.title: Countertop Replacement
kitchen.description: Replacing the countertops with a more modern and durable material like quartz or granite to enhance the kitchen's appeal.

kitchen.title: Lighting Upgrade
kitchen.description: Installing modern LED lighting fixtures to improve the kitchen's ambiance and energy efficiency.

kitchen.title: Backsplash Installation
kitchen.description: Adding a stylish backsplash to enhance the kitchen's aesthetic and protect the walls from spills.

kitchen.title: Painting Walls
kitchen.description: Repainting the kitchen walls with a fresh, neutral color to brighten the space and make it more appealing to potential buyers.

bath.title: Update Paint and Fixtures
bath.description: Repaint the bathrooms with neutral colors and update fixtures such as faucets, towel bars, and light fixtures to modern styles. This will refresh the look and appeal to a broader audience.

bath.title: Install New Vanities
bath.description: Replace the existing vanities with modern, stylish ones that offer more storage and a contemporary look. This will enhance functionality and aesthetics.

bath.title: Upgrade to Energy-Efficient Lighting
bath.description: Install energy-efficient LED lighting and smart switches. This not only modernizes the space but also appeals to eco-conscious buyers.

bath.title: Tile Replacement
bath.description: Replace outdated tiles with modern, durable options. Consider heated flooring for added luxury, which can be a strong selling point.

bath.title: Add a Frameless Glass Shower Enclosure
bath.description: Upgrade the shower area with a frameless glass enclosure to create a more open and luxurious feel. This is a popular feature in modern bathrooms.

other.title: Update Lighting Fixtures
other.description: Replace outdated lighting fixtures with modern, energy-efficient LED fixtures to enhance the aesthetic appeal and energy efficiency of the space.

other.title: Repaint Walls
other.description: Apply a fresh coat of neutral paint to the walls to brighten up the space and make it more appealing to potential buyers.

other.title: Upgrade Interior Doors and Hardware
other.description: Replace interior doors and hardware with modern designs to improve the overall look and feel of the home.

other.title: Install Crown Molding
other.description: Add crown molding to enhance the architectural interest and elegance of the rooms.

other.title: Refinish Staircase
other.description: Refinish the staircase to improve its appearance and durability, making it a focal point of the home.

bedroom.title: Paint and Accent Wall
bedroom.description: Repaint the bedroom with a neutral color to appeal to a broader audience. Add an accent wall with a modern design or wallpaper to create a focal point.

bedroom.title: Lighting Upgrade
bedroom.description: Replace outdated light fixtures with modern, energy-efficient options. Consider adding dimmable lights or smart lighting solutions for added appeal.

bedroom.title: Flooring Enhancement
bedroom.description: Upgrade the flooring to hardwood or high-quality laminate to increase the room's appeal and value. This can significantly enhance the overall look of the bedroom.

bedroom.title: Closet Organization System
bedroom.description: Install a closet organization system to maximize storage space and improve functionality. This is a cost-effective way to add value to the bedroom.

bedroom.title: Window Treatments
bedroom.description: Update window treatments with modern blinds or curtains to enhance privacy and style. Choose materials that complement the room's color scheme.
